summary: The Ebony Warrior....is now an insanely OP follower.
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------
REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC!
-----------------------------------------


This mod adds the Ebony Warrior as a follower waiting for you near the Whiterun entrance.
Does not mess with the quest or any scripts as he is a duplicated Follower-Ready copy.


===========================================================================================
WARNING: He is insanely OP and will dominate any enemy you encounter and commit any crime you want, as he is a LOYAL follower.
===========================================================================================
author: jedijosh920
